author: bconradis@thehill.com (Nathaniel Weixel)
title: Maryland, Virginia issue stay-at-home orders for all residents
description: Maryland and Virginia have issued stay-at-home orders for their residents as the coronavirus pandemic spreads across the U.S. Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan (R) and Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam (D) both urged residents to only leave their homes...
content:
Maryland, Virginia and Washington, D.C., have all issued stay-at-home orders for their residents as the coronavirus pandemic spreads across the U.S. 
Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan (R), Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam (D) and D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser (D) all urged re… [+2424 chars]
